sequence.questionText: Select the key areas that you need to consider when allocating targets for individual life insurance professionals.
sequence.instructionText: Select the correct options and click Submit.

options.option: Your team’s structure in terms of size and experience
The minimum individual performance levels
The previous quarter’s performance
Your life insurance professional’s personal goals

feedbacks.feedback: You need to consider all four areas when allocating targets for individual life insurance professionals
You need to consider all four areas when allocating targets for individual life insurance professionals

sequence.questionText: Which two of the following questions are related to team structure?
sequence.instructionText: Select the correct options and click Submit.

options.option: At what stage of development are your team members?
Are all of the existing individuals in your team up to the minimum performance levels?
How many new life insurance professionals do you need to recruit?
Is this the right time for a life insurance professional to take a larger proportion of the team’s targets?

feedbacks.feedback: Questions related to the stage of a life insurance professional’s development and to the number of new life insurance professionals that you need to recruit help you decide the team structure.
Questions related to the stage of a life insurance professional’s development and to the number of new life insurance professionals that you need to recruit help you decide the team structure.

sequence.questionText: Which one of the following questions is related to the area of previous performance?
sequence.instructionText: Select the correct option and click Submit.

options.option: What training, coaching and support does the life insurance professional need?
How will your developing life insurance professionals progress this quarter?
Is this the right time for a life insurance professional to take a larger proportion of the team’s targets?
What can you do to make sure your life insurance professionals meet or exceed their targets?

feedbacks.feedback: The decision to assign additional target to a life insurance professional is based on the fact that the life insurance professional has exceeded performance target in the past.

sequence.questionText: Which of the following questions fall into the area of your goals?
sequence.instructionText: Select the correct option and click Submit.

options.option: At what stage of development are your team members?
How many new life insurance professionals do you need to recruit?
What can you do to make sure your life insurance professionals meet or exceed their targets?
How much do you want to earn this quarter?

feedbacks.feedback: This question helps you to set sales targets for the life insurance professional and thus, falls in the area of your goals.

sequence.questionText: Which of the following is the first activity that should be carried out in a one-to-one planning meeting?
sequence.instructionText: Select the correct option and click Submit.

options.option: Discuss income expectations and expenses.
Agree on individual targets.
Review sales activity for last quarter and plan for the coming quarter.
Discover life insurance professional’s personal goals.

feedbacks.feedback: You should start the meeting with the life insurance professional’s personal goals in order to understand what drives the life insurance professional and what the long-term goals are.
